text: John Howard Carpenter (born January 16, 1948) is an American movie director, producer, writer and actor. He was born in Carthage, New York. He is known for horror and science fiction movies including Halloween, The Thing and Escape from New York. ==Other websites== * Category:Halloween (franchise) Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American movie editors Category:American screenwriters Category:American voice actors Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Movie producers from New York (state) Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:1948 births Category:Living people
title: John Carpenter
